sentences: She always studies on my lap.
A 15-minute walk is enough for my dog.
He notices the tension whenever we discuss his studies.
That's why many parents think like that.
My wife hopes our son will study overseas someday.
He recently quit his job to focus on taking care of his family.
He often spends money on education without consulting his partner.
He’s been under a lot of stress about financial issues.
She got a lot of stress from raising children.
She looks more depressed than me.
Once a week, I go to the gym.
If there's no big data, it's hard to predict.
It gets out of control sometimes.
One of my organs is weak.
It's very important to use only verified internet sites.
I recently saw some strange ads.
How many years ago was that?
If I could go back in time, I would still want my daughter.
I'd want to go outside and do something fun.
I have to take medicine every 10 hours.
I have to take the pill at 10 p.m.
If possible, I avoid drinking too much coffee.
It defeats the purpose of the sleeping pill.
My brother-in-law works with radioactive waste.
They will come up with a good plan.
Severe climate change is a big problem.
I'm getting enough sleep these days.
Even after that, I felt drowsy.
From now on, I will study hard.
I don't know why I’m not studying enough.
What time do you start working?
I like to reminisce about the past.
I must not go to my old school with my daughter.
There were many bad students when I was in school.
Smoking and drinking are not allowed.
I'll tell her all the bad effects of drinking and smoking.
She has a lot of homework.
korean: 그는 우리가 그의 공부에 대해 이야기할 때마다 분위기가 긴장된다는 걸 알아차려요.
그래서 그녀는 '아무 말도 하지 마세요'라고 말해요.
아내는 언젠가 아들이 해외에서 공부하길 바라고 있어요.
그는 최근 가족을 돌보기 위해 직장을 그만뒀어요.
그는 배우자와 상의하지 않고 교육비를 쓰는 일이 많아요.
그는 요즘 금전적인 문제로 스트레스를 많이 받고 있어요.
그녀는 아이들을 키우며 스트레스를 많이 받았어요.
나는 일주일에 한 번 헬스장에 가요.
가끔 통제가 안 될 때도 있어요.
인증된 사이트만 사용하는 게 정말 중요해요.
시간을 되돌릴 수 있다면, 나는 여전히 딸을 원할 거예요.
밖에 나가서 뭔가 재밌는 걸 하고 싶어요.
가능하면 커피를 너무 많이 마시지 않아요.
커피를 많이 마시면 수면제 효과가 없어져요.
형부는 방사성 폐기물과 관련된 일을 해요.
왜 공부를 충분히 안 하는지 모르겠어요.
딸과 내 고등학교에 가지 말아야 해요.
내가 학교 다닐 때는 나쁜 학생이 많았어요.
나는 그녀에게 흡연과 음주의 나쁜 점을 다 말할 거예요.
